reviews.review: I enjoyed aquaculture. Some assignment rubrics aren't clear on instruction so just read carefully. The lectures were boring at times, but take advantage of them and ask questions.

name: ANSC255
title: Introduction to Aquaculture
description: Prerequisite: ANSC101 and ANSC103; or must have completed an introductory biology course. Introduces the art and science of rearing aquatic animals and the essential principles of aquaculture. Students receive hands-on training in the methods required for successful husbandry and management of aquatic animals in their water environment. Students must pay a $50.00 lab materials fee.
